p: Based on the SI-MTT and SI-XTT values, Brequinar, Mycophenolate mofetil, Mycophenolic acid, and AVN-944 exhibited potent inhibitory effect on ZIKV new World strain PRVABC59. All other compounds exhibited moderate or weak inhibitory effects ( Figure 8 and Table 5). ATA, included as a control, exhibited moderate (SI-MTT) or weak (SI-XTT) inhibitory activities ( Figure 8 and Table 5).
